# grkmisc

The goal of grkmisc is to be helpful, most of all to [GerkeLab](https://gerkelab.com).
We hope that you find it helpful, too.

## Installation

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("gerkelab/grkmisc", upgrade = FALSE)
```
